12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al-Bara' bin 'Azib that:The bowing of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and when he raised his head from bowing, and his prostration, and the time between the two prostration, were almost equal in length

chapter.ara-name: باب قَدْرِ الْقِيَامِ بَيْنَ الرَّفْعِ مِنَ الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: The duration of the standing between rising up from bowing to prostrating
